keyMappings:
# 快速打开google 搜索窗口
map go Vomnibar.activate keyword=g


# 关闭左边标签页
map <Space>h closeTabsOnLeft
# 关闭右边标签页
map <Space>l closeTabsOnRight
# 关闭其它标签页
map <Space>a closeOtherTabs


# 向下滚动整页（向下滚动整页）
map ah scrollFullPageDown

# 向上滚动整页
map ag scrollFullPageUp


# 将下一个键传递到页
map aa passNextKey

# 在新选项卡中打开链接并切换到它
map ab LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewForegroundTab

# 下载链接url
map ac LinkHints.activateModeToDownloadLink


# 在新选项卡中打开书签
map ad Vomnibar.activateBookmarksInNewTab

# 在“匿名”窗口中打开链接
map ae LinkHints.activateModeToOpenIncognito
searchEngines:
# 自定义的搜索引擎

# l: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s&btnI I'm feeling lucky...

# gm: https://www.google.com/maps?q=%s Google maps

#  维基百科搜索。
w: https://www.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s Wikipedia

g: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google
y: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube

b: https://www.baidu.com/s?wd=%s 百度
bi: https://www.bing.com/search?q=%s Bing

zh: https://www.zhihu.com/search?type=content&q=%s 知乎
tb https://s.taobao.com/search?q=%s 淘宝
jd https://search.jd.com/Search?keyword=%s 京东
bz https://search.bilibili.com/all?keyword=%s b站
aqy https://so.iqiyi.com/so/q_%s 爱奇艺
tm https://list.tmall.com/search_product.htm?q=%s 天猫
yk https://so.youku.com/search_video/q_%s 优酷
db https://www.douban.com/search?q=%s 豆瓣
